Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2008 12:22PM stephen wrote: Hi, my name is helen, ive just registered and looking for help, my grandma died of breast cancer and now my sister, 42 has breast cancer, ive been under the genetic clinic who are now assuring me im 1 in 4 risk, having had a history of depression wont offer surgery, they will however remove the benign lump they found, any suggestions.
Posts.Title: removal of benign mass leads to dx neecie iodine
